罷了.definition: a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)

罷休.definition: to give up; to abandon (a goal etc); to let sth go; forget it; let the matter drop

罷免.definition: to remove sb from their post; to dismiss

罷官.definition: to dismiss from office; to resign from office

罷工.definition: a strike; to go on strike

罷黜.definition: to dismiss from office; to ban; to reject

罷黜百家，獨尊儒術.pinyin: ba4 chu4 bai3 jia1 , du2 zun1 ru2 shu4
罷黜百家，獨尊儒術.definition: Dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucian (idiom); sole dominant ideology
